https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yyKb8ajYeBmTS9iBJBoz6ZfJJ8d.jpg U.S.-based film professor Jamsheed Akrami talks to Iranian master Abbas Kiarostami in an inpromptu video interview, which offers a frank and funny view of Kiarostami rarely seen before. A Walk with Kiarostami
